ygData.subject: Oops!(2 o's or 3?)
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, sorry, I didn t know Xiane picked her up. I ll do a new Brix thing. This is outside the base now. Brix never went in.) Bronco looks around, everyone in

Okay, sorry, I didn't know Xiane picked her up. I'll do a new Brix 
thing. This is outside the base now. Brix never went in.)

Bronco looks around, everyone in battle. He sees the violence, the 
destruction. Rage starts boiling up inside him. He knows what's 
happening. He tries to hang on to his Maximal loyalty, but this time 
it's too strong. Brix begins to fade away.....and Bronco takes over.

"YES!!!!!!!! I'm back, and without that damned loyalty. When the 
fight is over, That other will take over again, so I've got to do 
this. Where's that bot who woke up the other? I remember reading 
something about him becoming a fox...."

Bronco looks over around the battle field and sees Fliq trying to 
attack Oinker.

"Hahahaha!!! Now it's your turn to die!"

Bonco pulls out his rocket launcher and fires two right at Fliq.
